nml_option.name: config_use_TEST_AM
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member TEST_AM is called.

nml_option.name: config_TEST_AM_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_TEST_AM_compute_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

package.name: am_TEST_AM
package.description: This package includes variables required for the am_TEST_AM analysis member.
